about-me.title: About me
about-me.description: Hi! I am Darío Gutiérrez Mori, a software developer that sometimes makes games (when i remember to). I love videogames, mushrooms (not the ones you are thinking about) and going hiking :)
about-me.nationality: I grew up and live in Asturias, Spain although I am also half Guatemalan!
about-me.gender: I identify as a non-binary person and use he/they/she pronouns. Just be respectful ;)
about-me.mushrooms: I like to pick up mushrooms! I tend to pick up only the ones I know but always look up species I am not familiar with to learn more!

celeste.title: Celeste
celeste.description: Wait what? Dario has a favorite videogame? They have never mentioned it EVER.
